title: Drawing, "The North Dome, Yosemite, California", 1872
medium: Brush and black wash, white gouache, graphite on tan wove paper.
signed: Signed in graphite, lower left: T. M.
inscribed: Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at ?:  The North Domes / Washington Column / & Royal Arch/ from the vernal fall stream/  looking down/ YoSemite Valley/  TM.
description: Vertical view of jagged rocks in foreground with rushing stream leading back through pines on valley floor to the North Dome of Yellowstone.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The North Dome, Yosemite, California", 1872.
1872. Brush and black wash, white gouache, graphite on tan wove paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-14.
